item.title: ‘Severance’ and ‘The Last of Us’ Among Set Decorators Society of America TV Award Winners
item.description: The Set Decorators Society of America has unveiled the winners for its 2024-25 SDSA TV Awards. Taking home the top honors were “Severance” and “The Last of Us.” The SDSA honors
